person.persName: Nicholas T. Berry (Clerk Marion Circuit Court)

body.p: Clerk of the Marion Circuit Court, Kentucky. Nelson County, Kentucky, native. Married Josephine Boucher Berry in 1855. Married Nancy H. Phillips Berry in 1858. Father of Samuel B. Berry. Attended Mount Merino College in Breckinridge County. Studied law under R. H. Rowntree. Member of the Roman Catholic Church.
